statements: SELECT * FROM articles WHERE article_id = 1;
SELECT title, authors FROM articles WHERE publication_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT article_id, title, authors, publication_date FROM articles WHERE authors LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT publication_date, abstract FROM articles ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM articles ORDER BY title DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT title, authors, publication_date FROM articles WHERE publication_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY publication_date ASC;
SELECT article_id, title, abstract FROM articles WHERE authors LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY article_id;
SELECT DISTINCT authors FROM articles ORDER BY authors ASC;
SELECT title, publication_date FROM articles WHERE title LIKE '%database%' ORDER BY publication_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM peer_reviewed_articles;
SELECT title, authors FROM peer_reviewed_articles WHERE published_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT article_id, title, abstract FROM peer_reviewed_articles WHERE doi IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM research_collaborations WHERE end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT project_title, collaborators FROM research_collaborations WHERE funding_source = 'NSF';
SELECT * FROM peer_reviewed_articles WHERE published_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT title, authors FROM peer_reviewed_articles WHERE doi IS NOT NULL ORDER BY published_date DESC;
SELECT article_id, title, published_date FROM peer_reviewed_articles WHERE authors LIKE '%John%' AND abstract IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM research_collaborations WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_title, description FROM research_collaborations WHERE funding_source = 'NSF' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM articles;
SELECT title, publication_date FROM articles;
SELECT article_id, title, authors FROM articles;
SELECT * FROM authors;
SELECT full_name, email FROM authors;
SELECT title, publication_date FROM articles ORDER BY publication_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT full_name, email FROM authors WHERE affiliation = 'University';
SELECT title, abstract FROM articles WHERE publication_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT title, full_name FROM articles JOIN collaborations ON articles.article_id = collaborations.article_id JOIN authors ON collaborations.author_id = authors.author_id;
SELECT article_id, full_name, collaboration_type FROM collaborations JOIN authors ON collaborations.author_id = authors.author_id WHERE collaboration_type = 'Lead';
SELECT * FROM articles;
SELECT title, publication_date, abstract FROM articles WHERE publication_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT full_name, email, affiliation FROM authors WHERE affiliation = 'University';
SELECT keyword FROM keywords WHERE keyword LIKE '%data%';
SELECT article_id, title, authors FROM articles ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE publication_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT title, authors FROM articles ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT full_name, email FROM authors WHERE affiliation = 'University';
SELECT article_id, title, keywords FROM articles JOIN keywords ON articles.article_id=keywords.keyword_id;
SELECT article_id, title, authors, publication_date FROM articles JOIN collaborations ON articles.article_id=collaborations.article_id JOIN authors ON collaborations.author_id=authors.author_id;
SELECT * FROM articles;
SELECT title, author FROM articles WHERE publish_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT article_id, publish_date, keywords FROM articles WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM articles ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT author_name, affiliation, email FROM authors WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE publish_date > '2022-01-01' AND author = 'John Doe';
SELECT title, author, publish_date FROM articles ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT article_id, title, author, abstract FROM articles WHERE keywords LIKE '%science%';
SELECT author_name, email FROM authors WHERE phone_number LIKE '555%';

SELECT a.title, ar.author_name, r.comments FROM articles a JOIN collaborations c ON a.article_id = c.article_id JOIN authors ar ON c.author_id = ar.author_id JOIN reviews r ON a.article_id = r.article_id WHERE r.rating > 3;
